Key Match Events: Christian Braun's poster dunk on Rudy Gobert led to a confrontation and double technical fouls
Minnesota closed the game on a 17-4 run to erase a 10-point deficit and steal a victory
Nikola Jokić committed two turnovers in the final four minutes, including one that led to a three-point play for the Timberwolves
Post-Match Reflections: Christian Braun took responsibility for the loss, stating that he needs to be more responsible and control himself on the court
Nikola Jokić's struggles in the final four minutes were a significant factor in the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jamal Murray is struggling to find his form, shooting just 37.0 percent from the field in five games
The Russell Westbrook experiment is not going well, with a minus-51 plus-minus in 104 minutes this season
Others: The Denver Nuggets are a deeply flawed team with a superstar in Nikola Jokić, and are below-average by defensive rating and net rating
The team is struggling to execute, and their lone wins have come in two overtime games against the Toronto Raptors and Brooklyn Nets
